        public void setVisible(boolean b)

      • updateTitle

        public void updateTitle(boolean currentPlayer)
        Updates the window title to reflect whether it is this player's turn.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - true to add text to indicate that it is this player's turn, false to return the window title to just the player name
